reviewText: I purhased this DVD back in Nov as a Christmas gift for my Dad. Campbell films also sent a bonus DVD which was a nice gesture. The T-Bird DVD wouldn't play so I contacted the seller. Even though I had made the purchase almost 2 months ago, they happily sent me a replacement (works fine), + another bonus DVD (different one). I'm very satisfied w/ the new DVD's & service I received; would buy from again. *PS: My Dad enjoyed the DVD's
